text: Abdur Rahman Biswas (1 September 1926 - 3 November 2017) was a Bangladeshi politician. He was the 11th President of Bangladesh during 1991 to 1996. He was elected as a representative to the East Pakistan Legislative Assembly in 1962 and 1965. Biswas died on 3 November 2017 at a hospital in Dhaka of respiratory failure, at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Presidents of Bangladesh Category:Politicians from Barisal Division Category:Bangladeshi lawyers Category:Pakistani politicians Category:5th Jatiya Sangsad members
title: Abdur Rahman Biswas
